lines.text: Oh, Joey, please tell me you're only donating your time.

lines.text: Alright, come on you guys, it's not that big a deal. Really... I mean, I just go down there every other day and... make my contribution to the project. Hey, hey, but at the end of two weeks, I get seven hundred dollars.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Wow, ooh, you're gonna be making money hand over fist!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: OK, we got the cole slaw, we got the buns...

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: We've got the ground-up flesh of formerly cute cows and turkeys, ew...

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Men are here.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: We make fire. Cook meat.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Then put out fire by peeing, no get invited back.

lines.speaker: monica and phoebe
lines.text: Ewww!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh Joey, Melanie called, said she's gonna be late.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh, OK.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: So how are things going with you two? Is she becoming your  special someone?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I don't know, she's, uh.... she's pretty great.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah? What does she think of your little science project?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What, you think I'm gonna tell a girl I like that I'm also seeing a cup?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Man's got a point.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, the tough thing is, she really wants to have sex with me.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Crazy bitch.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah, well, I still got a week left to go in the program, and according to the rules, if I want to get the money I'm not allowed to conduct any... ersonal experiments, if you know what I mean.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Joey... we always know what you mean.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Hey.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Hey.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: How long did you think this barbecue was gonna last?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I'm going to China.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Jeez, you say one thing, and...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: You're going to China?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah, i-it's for the museum. Someone found a bone, we want the bone, but they don't want us to have the bone, so I'm going over there to try to persuade them to give us the boit'sit's a whole big bone thing. Anyway, I'm gonna be gone for like, uh... like a week, so, uh, if you wanna reach me, y-you can't. So here's my itinerary . Um... here's a picture of me...

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, let me see!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: : Could you take it to Carol's every now and then, and show it to Ben, just so he doesn't forget me?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Hi, Ben. I'm your father. I am... the head. Aaaaaahhhh....  Alright, this barbecue is gonna be very fun.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hey, is Rachel here? Um, I wanted to wish her a happy birthday before I left.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh no, she's out having drinks with Carl.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh.  Hey, who's Carl?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: You know, that guy she met at the coffeehouse.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, well, see, there's this guy she met at the...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: At the coffeehouse, right.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: So you do know who he is!  Sorry.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: OK, I'm gonna go say goodbye to the guys.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, hey, y'know what? Tell them that bone story.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Hi.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hey!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: ....I have to go to China.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: The country?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No no, this big pile of dishes in my mom's breakfront. Do you guys know who Carl is?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Uh, let's see... Alvin... Simon... Theodore.... no.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Well, Rachel's having drinks with him tonight.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh no! How can she do that when she's never shown any interest in you?!?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Forget about her.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: He's right, man. Please. Move on. Go to China. Eat Chinese food.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Course there, they just call it food.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah... I guess. I don'tI don't know. Alright, just... just give her this for me, OK?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Listen, buddy, we're just looking out for you.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I know.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: We want you to be happy. And I may only have a couple beers in me, but... I love you, man.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I'm still on my first. I just think you're nice.

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: Anyway, that's when me and my friends started this whole fruit basket business. We call ourselves 'The Three Basketeers.'

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Like the three musketeers, only with fruit.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Ooooh.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: OK, how does everybody like their burgers?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh, no, no, no. Presents first. Food later.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Hey, hold on there, tiger. How's it going? How you holding up?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, not so good. She definitely thinks tonight is the night we're gonna... complete the transaction, if you know what I...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Then you do. Heh, heh.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: So, uh, have you ever thought about being there for her?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Y'know, just be there for her.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Not following you.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Think about it.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: OK, I'm guessing this is from...

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well, thank you, Melanie.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: OK, this one right here is from me.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: OK... ah, it's light... ...it rattles... it's...  Travel Scrabble! Oooohhh, thank you!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: This one's from Joey... feels like a book. Thinks it's a book... feels like a book. And......it's a book!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, it's Dr. Seuss!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: : That book got me through some tough times.

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: There is a little child inside this man!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yes, the doctors say if they remove it, he'll die.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Who's this from?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh, that's Ross's.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh... ...  Oh my God. He remembered.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Remembered what?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: It was like months ago. We were walking by this antique store, and I saw this pin in the window, and I told him it was just like one my grandmother had when I was a little girl. Oh! I can't believe he remembered!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well, sure, but can you play it on a plane?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh, it's so pretty. This must have cost him a fortune.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I can't believe he did this.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Come on, Ross? Remember back in college, when he fell in love with Carol and bought her that ridiculously expensive crystal duck?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: What did you just say?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: ahem... um... Crystal duck.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No, no, no.... the, um, the... 'love' part?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: F-hah.... flennin....

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh.... my God.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh, no-no-no-no-no....

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: That's good, just keep rubbing your head. That'll turn back time.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I mean, this is unbelievable.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I know. This is really, really huge.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: No it's not. It's small. It's tiny. It's petite. It's wee.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Nuh-uh. I don't think any of our lives are ever gonna be the same ever again.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: OK, is there a mute button on this woman?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I think this is so great! I mean, you and Ross! D-did you have any idea?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No! None! I mean, my first night in the city, he mentioned something about asking me out, but nothing ever happened, so I just... : W-well, what else did he say? I mean, does he, like, want to go out with me?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, given that he's desperately in love with you, he probably wouldn't mind getting a cup of coffee or something.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ross? All this time? Well, I've got to talk to him.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: H-He's in China!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: The country.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No, no, wait.  His flight doesn't leave for another forty-five more minutes.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What about the time difference?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: From here to the airport?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yes!  You're never gonna make it!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Rachel, what're you gonna say to him?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I-I-I don't know.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well then maybe you shouldn't go.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: He's right, cause if you're just gonna, like, break his heart, that's the kind of thing that can wait.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yeah, but if it's good news, you should tell him now.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe I'll know when I see him.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Here, look, alright, does this help?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Noooo... look, all I know is that I cannot wait a week until I see him. I mean, this is just too big. Y'know, I just, I've just gotta talk to him. I... I gotta... OK, I'll see you later.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Rachel, I love you! Deal with me first!

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: Alright!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ni-chou chi-ma!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ross! Excuse me, pardon me, excuse me....

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: Hi!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hi.

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: May I see your boarding pass?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh, no, no, I don't have one. I just need to talk to my friend.

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: Oh, oooh. I'm sorry. You are not allowed on the jetway unless you have a boarding pass.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No, I know, but Ihe just went on. He's right there, he's got the blue jacket on, I... can I j-just...

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: No no no! Federal regulations!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: OK, alright, OK, um... then could you please, uh... just give him a message for me? Please? This is very important.

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: Alright. What's the message?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Uh... I don't know.

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: Sir? Sir? Excuse me, sir? Uh... I have a message for you.

lines.speaker: man
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: flight attendant
lines.text: It's from Rachel. She said that she loved the present, and she will see you when you get back.

lines.speaker: man
lines.text: : Toby... Oh, for God's sake, I don't know what she's talking about! There's no Rachel! Don't give me that deep freeze.

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: Mmmmmm... Oh, Joey, Joey, Joey... I think I blacked out there for a minute!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Heh, heh. It was nothin'.

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: Well, now we've gotta find something fun for you!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Uhhh.. y'know what? Forget about me. Let's, uh... let's give you another turn.

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: M-Me again?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Sure! Why not?

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: Boy, somebody's gonna get a big fruit basket tomorrow.

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: Oooh, I gotta tell you... you are nothing like I thought you would be.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: How do you mean?

lines.speaker: melanie
lines.text: I don't know, I-I guess I just had you pegged as one of those guys who're always 'me, me, me.' But you... you're a giver. You're like the most generous man I ever met. I mean... you're practically a woman.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Uh, so, uh, Rach, uh... do you wanna save this wrapping paper, I mean, it's only a little bit torn... so are you gonna go for it with Ross or should I just throw it out?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know... I thought about it all the way there, and I thought about it all the way back... and, uh, oh, you guys, y'know, it's Ross. Y'know what I mean? I mean, it's Ross.

lines.speaker: monica and phoebe
lines.text: Sure.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I don't know, I mean, this is just my initial gut feeling... but I'm thinking... oh, I'm thinking it'd be really great.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh my God, me too! Oh! Oh, we'd be like friends-in-law! Y'know what the best part is? The best part is that you already know everything about him! I mean, it's like starting on the fifteenth date!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yeah, but, y'know, it's... it would be like starting on the fifteenth date.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Another good point.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No, I mean, I mean, when you're at the fifteenth date, y'know, you're already in a very relationshippy place. Y'know, it's... you're committed.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Huh?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Well, I mean, then what happens if it doesn't work out?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Why isn't it working out?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I don't know... sometimes it doesn't.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Is he not cute enough for you?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Does he not make enough money?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No, I'm just....

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Maybe there's someone else.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Wha...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Is there? Is there someone else?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: No! There is.. there is noone else!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Then why the hell are you dumping my brother?!?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hey, big...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Shhhh!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: ...spender.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: She's still asleep.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: So how'd it go?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh, it was amazing. You know how you always think you're great in bed?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: The fact that you'd even ask that question shows how little you know me.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Well, it's like, last night, I couldn't do the thing that usually makes me great. So I had to do all this other stuff. And the response I got... man, oh man, it was like a ticker tape parade!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yes, I know, as it happens my room is very very close to the parade route.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: It was amazing! And not just for her... uh-uh. For me, too. It's like, all of a sudden, I'm blind. But all my other senses are heightened, y'know? It's like... I was able to appreciate it on another level.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I didn't know you had another level.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I know! Neither did I!

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Hey, great skirt! Birthday present?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh, from who?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: From you. I exchanged the blouse you got me.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well, it's the thought. Hey, doesn't Ross's flight get in in a couple hours? At gate 27-B?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Uh, yeah. Uh, Monica, y'know, honey, I've been thinking about it and I've decided thisthis whole Ross thing, it's just not a good idea.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh, why?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Because, I feel like I wouldn't just be going out with him. I would be going out with all of you. Oh, and there would just be all this pressure, and I don't wanna...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: No, no, no, no, no, no pressure, no pressure!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Monica, nothing has even happened yet, and you're already so...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: I am not 'so'! OK, I was a teensy bit weird at first, but... I'll be good. I promise.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Who is it?

lines.speaker: intercom
lines.text: It's me, Carl.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: C'mon up.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Behind my brother's back?  ... is exactly the kind of crazy thing you won't be hearing from me.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Seven hundred bucks!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Alright, you did it! Do we have any fruit?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Man, hell of a two weeks, huh? Y'know what, though? I really feel like I learned something.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Really? So, you're gonna stick with this 'it's all for her' thing?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What, are you crazy? When a blind man gets his sight back, does he walk around like this?

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I'm just sayin', if I see one more picture of Ed Begley, Jr. in that stupid electric car, I'm gonna shoot myself! I mean, don't get me wrong... I'm not against environmental issues per se.... it's just that guy!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I can't believe you'd rather go out with him than me.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Would you excuse me, please? I'm trying to have a date here.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Fine, just stop thinking about me.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Can't do it, can you?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: So I'm thinking about you. So what?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I don't get it. What do you see in this guy, anyway?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well... he happens to be a very nice... guy....

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: I mean, come on, buddy, get a real car!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Rachel, come on. Give us a chance.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ross, it's too hard.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No, no, no... why, because it might get weird for everyone else? Who cares about them. This is about us. Look, I-I've been in love with you since, like, the ninth grade.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ross, you're like my best friend.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I know.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: If we broke up, and I lost you...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa. What makes you think we're gonna break up?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well, have you been involved with someone where you haven't broken up?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No. But... it only has to happen once. Look, you and I both know we are perfect for each other, right? I mean... so, the only question is... are you attracted to me?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I don't know... I mean, I've never looked at you that way before.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Well, start looking.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Wow.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Exactly! And you just know I'm gonna be the guy caught behind this hammerhead in traffic!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Right! You're right!

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: Heh... y'know?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: You know what?

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: I forgot... I am supposed to pick up a friend at the airport. I am so sorry! I'm so... if you want to stay, and finish your drinks, please do....  I meanI'm sorry. I-I-I gotta go. I'm sorry.

lines.speaker: carl
lines.text: But...

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Excuse me, pardon me, excuse me, excuse me, sorry. Hi.

lines.speaker: man
lines.text: For God's sake, will you let it go? There's no Rachel!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Oh, hey, hey, I got that.

lines.speaker: julie
lines.text: Oh, thanks, sweetie.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No problem. I cannot wait for you to meet my friends.

lines.speaker: julie
lines.text: Really?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: julie
lines.text: You don't think they'll judge and ridicule me?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: No, no, they will. I just... uh...

lines.speaker: ross and julie
lines.text: Can't wait.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Come on, they're gonna love you.
